<includeonly>
<tr>
  <th scope="row">{{{label|}}}</th>
  <td style="--start: {{{start|0}}}; --end: {{{end|0}}};">{{#if:{{{data|}}}|<span class="data">{{{data}}}</span>}} {{#if:{{{tooltip|}}}|<span class="tooltip">{{{tooltip}}}</span>}}</td>
</tr>
</includeonly><noinclude>
== Template:ChartsCss slice ==
Helper for `Template:ChartsCss pie`.

=== Parameters ===
* `label`: row label
* `start`: raw CSS value for `--start` (usually `0.0`..`1.0`)
* `end`: raw CSS value for `--end` (usually `0.0`..`1.0`)
* `data` (optional): value shown in a `<span class="data">…</span>`
* `tooltip` (optional): tooltip HTML/wikitext shown in a `<span class="tooltip">…</span>`
</noinclude>
